name: @vanillawc/wc-markdown
author: Evan Plaice <evanplaice@gmail.com> (https://evanplaice.com/)
description: A vanilla Markdown web component with optional syntax highlighting

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:min
scripts.build:assets: cp -r node_modules/prism-es6/themes themes && cp -r node_modules/prism-es6/components components
scripts.package: npx rimraf package && npm pack | tail -n 1 | xargs tar -xf
